Description:
Qualifications, Skills & Experience:Relevant tertiary qualifications preferred i.e. – Technology and/or Business related
Experience of working in an IT Reseller and MSP with strong focus on end user sales
Experience of selling IT infrastructure & Professional Services spanning various domains (Network, Security, Storage, etc.)
Experience with positioning different vendors (Cisco, Fortinet etc.)
Excellent skills of content creation, market research & analysis
Ability to gather customers’ requirements in an effective manner
Ability to act as an effective bridge between the in house and end user technical teams
Overall 10-15 years of relevant industry experience in UAE marketJob Details
